title: Shinobi Infiltrator armor
summaries: The Shinobi Infiltrator armor is an armor set purchased from the Tavernkeep for 1500000*150 [img:Defender Medal]/ 225 in total, after Golem has been defeated. It consists of the Shinobi Infiltrator's Helmet, Shinobi Infiltrator's Torso, and Shinobi Infiltrator's Pants.
A full set of Shinobi Infiltrator armor will provide the following stats:

• +54 defense
  • +20% melee damage
  • +20% melee speed
  • +60% minion damage
  • +25% / +20% melee critical strike chance
  • +30% / +20% movement speed
  • +3 extra sentry slots
Additionally, wearing the full set will increase the attack rate of Lightning Aura sentries, will cause them to deal critical hits with a fixed 25% chance, and will increase their radius by 4 tiles.
The Shinobi Infiltrator armor set is a direct upgrade to the Monk armor set.

statistics.Set Bonus:
Increases your max number of sentries
Greatly enhances Lightning Aura effectiveness
statistics.Buy: 150 [img:Defender Medal] (set)
statistics.Sell: 9 (set)
